name: Goblin
text: Major: Deal 2 damage to an adjacent target\n\nMinor: Deal 2 damage to a target

name: Ogre
text: Major: Deal 4 damage to an adjacent target\n\nMajor: Deal 2 damage to an adjacent target and 2 damage to a target adjacent to that target

name: Skeleton Archer
text: Major: deal 3 damage to a target\n\nMinor: Regain 1 health

name: Zombie
text: Major: Deal 2 damage to an adjacent target

name: Necromancer
text: Major: Summon a Zombie\n\nMinor: deal 2 necrotic damage to a target
